overview:
Pulkit Singhal is Fermyon’s Co-Founder & CTO. In the past, he has worn many hats ranging from UI design and development to optimizing back-end architecture over his 5-year tenure with HP, and previously at Trustgenix (acquired by HP) and JPMC. Pulkit brings a wealth of core development experience in large-scale enterprise software systems, having worked on a variety of areas for prominent enterprise product lines such as HPâ€™s Product and Portfolio Management and the OpenView product suite.

Pulkit is an avid technology blogger and active in several open source communities and forums such as CouchBase, ElasticSearch and BitBucket. He holds a MS & BS in Computer Science from NYU Poly.
